title: How to write a formal email to a registrar - Quora

response.answer_text: How to you write a letter with same format. Be very professional, as a academicians I can tell you, you would very lucky If you receive a reply back from the Registrar office. Use BLUF ( Bottom line up front) type everything active sentence. Be precise, mind your word count. DO NOT BE LENGTHY. Be short deliver your matter in powerful words not more than 8 lines GOOD LUCK
